video.title: Ever After High
video.synopsis: The kids of fairytale characters attend a school with two cliques: those who accept their fairytale destinies and those who want to write their own.

episodes.synopsis: Ever After High begins as Raven Queen is questioning her pre-written destiny as the next Evil Queen, which could disrupt this year's Legacy Day.
episodes.title: Legacy Day

episodes.synopsis: The narrators tell the tale of Ever After High and introduce the students, who are destined to become legends (or not).
episodes.title: Welcome to Ever After

episodes.synopsis: Cupid rallies the kids to celebrate a long-lost holiday called True Hearts Day as Ashlynn and Hunter's relationship is revealed to the world.
episodes.title: True Hearts Day

episodes.synopsis: On this very special school holiday, life is turned upside down when a Royal and Rebel switch sides...and the Storybook of Legends goes missing!
episodes.title: Thronecoming

episodes.synopsis: When Kitty's mom plays a major prank, a curse causes our fairytale teens to act opposite of themselves, threatening the school's happily ever after.
episodes.title: Series Special: Spring Unsprung
